descriptionlist.description:
SphereView is another perspective view of the SpringBoard in which replace the home screen with a fantastic 3D Sphere. Is zoomable so you can watch easily your apps even with a hundreds of them.
Also have a Dock with your notifications apps.

Works in portrait and landscape.
Compatible with iOS 8 and 9 on iPhone and iPad.

After installed go to the SphereView option on Settings for the activation.

Configure options from Settings.

changelog.change: fixed a bug that prevent opening apps from Favorite Dock
fixed slow animation of the sphere
added a new dock to set your favorite apps
